ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Voigt model of an emission feature

DESC.PARA: A model of an emission feature, where a Gaussian modeling the core is added to a Lorentzian modeling the wings. The approximation presented in Astrophysical Formulae (K. R. Lang, 1980, 2nd ed., p. 220) is used. This approximation works best when the ratio between the FWHM of the Gaussian and Lorentzian sub-components is near unity.

ROW.DATA: Center of the emission feature, in Angstroms
